website_summaries.verdict: Practical, attractive, and value-priced. The best choice if you want a nice wine rack without spending a lot of money.
pros: Comes assembled and is easy to move
Attractive French-style design looks great in virtually any room
cons: The metal feet have the tendency to wobble and could potentially scratch some floor surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a rack!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this wine rack but after reading the reviews I decided to order it and I am glad I did. The rack comes assembled. It is sturdy and well made. Instantly adds charm to the space. The rack is beautiful. Not too big or small. It does not hold bottles with fuller bottoms. Fits standard size and most wine bottles. I am very pleased with my purchase and have already received lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rack. When filled with even just a handful of bottles, it is sturdy, even on carpet. I was able to fit the larger bottles of sparkling wine bottle as well as standard wine bottles and port bottles.
customer_reviews.author: AvidUrbanFantasizer

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, elegant wine rack at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, elegant wine rack at an excellent price. Please note, however, that it does not come with foot slides and the metal feet are a bit too sharp for hardwood floors. I got cap style sliders at my local hardware store that fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan & Crew

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: These look good (I ordered 2) and are easy to find a home for due to their smaller size. Holds pinot as well as cab bottles. Quite happy with my purchase. I use these in my home, not in a wine cellar or storage, so their appearance was important to me. And size was also a factor in trying to find a home for the rack. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: J Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Wine Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wine rack; it is attractive, it is sturdy, and it holds many bottles of wine. One great aspect of the wine rack is that it requires absolutely no construction on the purchaser's part. It comes ready to use. Just put it where you want it, and voila, you are ready to fill it up with your favorite wine. The wine bottles fit safely and effectively at a slight tilt in order to keep the cork from drying out. My husband and I love this wine rack. We have only had it for a little over a week, but we put it to use immediately. If anything changes, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with wire design work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Not a big wine drinker, but always receiving as gifts. Needed a stylish display rack for my dinning room. I like the wire design work,adds character, not just a boring straight edged piece. Would have bought a larger size if available. Like 30-32 bottles. I like the circle openings, but they could have been larger to accommodate larger diameter bottles. Champagne bottles will not fit. I would suggest putting felt pads on the bottom legs if you are putting it on wooden floors. Overall nice product.
customer_reviews.author: reading junkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for the area for which it was destined and with maximum bottle capacity. A heavier gauge frame and front-to-back bottle underwire for safety when moving bottles would be a plus; however, these would likely add to size, weight, cost and/or limit capacity. So I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Storage for wine festival excursion
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, compact wine rack. I loved the look and size of this rack and bought 2 to store bottles from a recent wine festival. I sat them side by side and they don't take up much room at all, and look good. I was contemplating a larger, more ornate rack, but like the simpler lines and more compact size of this rack. Love it. Came on time and well boxed. I added my own felt feet to protect wooden floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nat-real buyer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack looks nice, but there is nothing for the glass wine bottle to lock into or catch on. As long as the rack never moves and it is on level ground, perhaps everything is fine. But if someone bumps the rack the bottles can easily fall out. It did not work for what I needed. Perhaps it is intended for a special type of bottle that actually fits. Maybe that is what the Bordeaux name tells someone who knows what they are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is everything it promises to be
customer_reviews.text: it is sturdy, attractive and takes no assembly so all you have to do is take it out of the box and fill it up with wine. at the price it is a great bargain and i would buy it again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: helen anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a bit of time searching for a wine rack before I found this one. It's perfect—very stylish and affordable, compact, and holds 23 bottles of wine. I ended up purchasing two of them, which I placed side by side in my dining room, where they blend perfectly with my rustic furniture. I am very pleased with my purchase. They arrived already assembled, in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: This wine rack is beautiful, useful
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is beautiful, useful, lightweight and sturdy. I placed it near my hutch and it helped me out with all of the extra bottles I had from NAPA valley...when all of my other table top wine racks were filled. The bottles feel very secure in the holders and it keeps it straight. It's beautiful visually also...I got the bronze color, which gave it that rustic look. It's easy to pick up and move, if I decide to locate to another part of the house. I am very happy with this purchase and I'm sure I will be in the market to get more of them. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️🍷

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch, and convenient storage for our wine.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our small space, 23 bottles of our favorite wines. It will NOT hold magnums or port bottles. Standard wine bottle sizes only. But, that's fine with us. It also keeps the bottles tilted at the right angle to keep the corks from drying out. I recommend keeping your wine rack away from sunny locations, and away from heating vents, to preserve the quality of your wine. I would say keep the labels down. But, that rule actually applies to wine cellars just to keep the labels from getting dusty over the years. I don't think we'll have that problem. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Berry

customer_reviews.title: We like the rack
customer_reviews.text: This Sorbus wine rack came in well packed and arrived quickly. We like the rack, sturdy, stylish and works as advertised. One small issue, standard diameter bottles fit fine but the slightly fatter 750ml are very tight or don't fit at all (most 750ml's will fit). We managed to get most of our utility wine in the rack, that's what counted most. we bought this for it's looks to fill a gap in our pantry and hoped it was sturdy as well (and it is). Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior

customer_reviews.title: This wine rack is a perfect fit in my living room and holds all my ...
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is a perfect fit in my living room and holds all my bottles of wine with room to spare, very sturdy and nothing to put together, it's ready to go right out of the box. I highly recommend this wine rack!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Messersmith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for those on a budget, and small homes
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a small apartment, or home this wine rack is a great choice. It takes little, to no space, whilst fitting 23 bottles. Although, if put in a larger home or area this thing will look tiny. Sturdy, light weight, and elegant in it's simplicity it makes for an excellent purchase. Specially for the price. A functional and aesthetic wine rack is difficult to find on a budget. If you're reading this look no further, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: El Monks

customer_reviews.title: space-economical, doesn't look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks good in my small apartment. I live in 950 square foot condo, so this was a good economical way of storing a large quantity of wine glasses. It has a carrying handle on top which is nice for room rearrangement. It stores wine bottles slightly at a downward facing angle which I guess is supposed to be good for wine glasses. I hope. I don't know much about wine to be honest, but I got one of those large multi-packs from wine insiders in an attempt to learn, and this thing holds two shipments worth.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Economical and aesthetically pleasing. Great price. Small foot print for so many bottles. Can feel flimsy, until you load up the wine, then it sits very sturdily. Highly recommend as entry-level storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use right out of the box....almost
customer_reviews.text: This very sturdy wine rack is definitely worth the money. Nice welds and decent paint job round it out. The only thing is you'll need to thoroughly wipe this down. Luckily I opened the box up on a tiled area. Don't open it on carpet! Lots of welding/shop dust, but easy to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: The wine rack was just what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack was just what I was looking for. I installed felt pads to the metal feet to prevent possible damage to my floor.
customer_reviews.author: James Watson

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is smaller than what I expected (the dimensions are correct) but that is fine. More compact is probably a better term. It looks good and could fit in just about anywhere. It holds most 750 ml bottles just fine. It does not accommodate most sparkling wine bottles - my Kirkland Prosecco for instance does not fit. I had no trouble with any of my regular wine bottles however, and it is full!
customer_reviews.author: M. Browne

customer_reviews.title: My significant other/better half owns a fairly sizeable wine collection ...
customer_reviews.text: My significant other/better half owns a fairly sizeable wine collection, most of which was accumulated from overseas. Yet, we didn't have a proper way to store/house it...until this purchase. When I went searching for a wine rack, functionality was paramount. This product is that, in spades, and has a small floor/counter space footprint to boot. It's durable, yet light, and boasts a neutral coloration that will match most house decor schemes. In the event that we accumulate even more wine, we'll add a twin rack of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I rate five stars because it is a nice piece of work and the smaller bottles fit. if you get a bottle of wine that's 1.5L or larger, it will not fit in the hole. 750ml bottles fit perfectly. Still, the rack fits in just about in any nook or cranny or displays your collection of wines just about anywhere you want it. I am not a wine drinker and I found out wine is rather expensive, but I will fill my rack.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Turberville

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find a simple wine rack that was metal with no fully ironwork. Sadly its wobbly and doesn't stand level. I had to adjust the legs so much that 2 are now barely screwed in. It's also very thin tubing so not sturdy. I worry about putting my high end wines in it for fear they will fall out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Simple wine rack that fits in a small space and so inexpensive! I’ve looked all around for something to hold wine and this was by far the Best Buy I found. Looks attractive in my kitchen and I’ve gotten several compliments on it. I loved it so much I bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Patton

customer_reviews.title: Tidy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Nice little wine rack. I chose the black one as it fit my decor better, but there seems to be a gray one, too. It's not very big in terms of footprint or height, but it holds enough wine for my purposes, and seems stable enough, even on carpet. I am, however, making sure I load the bottles from the bottom first, as it's possible it could get top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K. E. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed. Wine rack arrived covered in rust and back right leg was bent at 45 deg angle. Could not be straighted. We cleaned off rust. Painted and shored up leg. Would have cost to much to return and not sure another one would have been better
customer_reviews.author: John Buono

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this wine rack. It’s beautiful, lightweight, and requires no assembly. Unfortunately, the feet are uneven so it’s super wobbly. I was too nervous to even try and fill it with wine. Instead, I’m returning it and searching for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Bottles of my favorite chardonnay and sparkling wines do not fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately only holds "skinny" wine bottles. Bottles of my favorite chardonnay and sparkling wines do not fit. Bummer because it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is the second rack I have bought. The first is so neat and keeps my wine so well organized. When I had an opportunity to increase my wine collection, I immediately knew this was the rack to put it in. Holds just the right # of bottles, holds different size bottles for those that are just a little fatter. Is very attractive and small enough to fit in the dining area, a small pantry area. Just excellent versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Marrette Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Well constricted, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent process resulted in receiving product in a few days in Rome, Italy. Great communication along the way added to customer satisfaction. Product is as advertised and even looks better in person with a great design. Product is sturdy and does not require assembly. Most satisfied Still satisfied. Bought the second Sorbus Wine Rack!!!! Great fit and quality..
customer_reviews.author: gary ehret

customer_reviews.title: Proud owner of 3.....excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 3rd purchase of this item...very sturdy, attractive and stable. The bottles will have a very slight backward tilt to keep them secure...comes completely assembled which is a blessing. Placed in a low traffic area or nook is ideal! It will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo Casazza

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! No assembly- Hold lots of bottle.  Looks classy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something with ZERO assembly, that could hold many bottles, not just wine but also my other bottles like oil, etc. And also something that looked good. I got it all. I am very pleased and it looked very good in my kitchen. I highly recommend it. My kitchen actually looks good with this item. You will not regret it. It could go in the kitchen or dining room. It is that beautiful and also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Vivianne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Wine Rack - No Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: I love this 23 bottle wine rack! It came boxed and ready to go, no assembly required. It is pretty solid and steady. The only thing I did was add some felt pads to the feet to protect my floor. I wanted a nice looking wine rack to go next to my home bar/server and this definitely fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Wendyloo

customer_reviews.title: Good looking wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my wine rack. It's small and fits in a small space, but it looks good enough to be prominently displayed. It's sturdy once the bottles are in place, but can be moved around if needed. It's perfect for apartments. I'm glad my bottles are now on their side to keep that cork from going dry and letting air in. I just wish there was a slightly bigger version that held like 36 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dio

customer_reviews.title: A Lovely Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wine rack for our overflow of wine and are quite pleased. It came assembled, is quite study once wine is on it, and it looks very nice in our dining area. We have it on the floor, but one could put it on a table or buffet. I wish it came in a bigger size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Green

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I received mine today (Bronze). I am ordering another one. I live in the Wine Country so I have a wide variety of wines. This does hold 23 bottles nicely. It does not take up a lot of space either. Nice size and very sturdy. Update: I have ordered 3 of these wine racks. I truly like the way they look and the sturdiness of them.
customer_reviews.author: Busgal

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly at first, but works out great!
customer_reviews.text: A lot wobbly... but once you put wine bottles in it, it stabilizes just fine. Very nice addition to our dining room. Holds my red wine bottles nicely. Great for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.E

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wine bottle holder
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that maybe it would tip over once we filled it but so far it's been sturdy enough, no problems. It's a good height for our needs and I like the look. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: Got this a while ago and still love it. Holds a good number of wine bottles. Lays them on the side to keep the cork moistened, so no issues with corks crumbling for those bottles you hold on to for a while. The material, metal, is sturdy and it is easy to put together. My only complaint is there are some wine and champagne bottles that do not fit into the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping and great price
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and great price. Looks awesome. Unfortunately as I just finished putting the 12th bottle in, I bumped it and 1 fell out and broke. Not happy about cleaning that one up. Not sure if there is a correct or incorrect way to put the bottles in??? I did swap them around for just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Kulick

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sturdy wine rack that Holds 23 bottles of wine. It’s a great addition for my wine storage and it fits nicely in a small space. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing additional wine storage and it’s very nice looking. I love it and am extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon From California

customer_reviews.title: very good and nice looking racks
customer_reviews.text: perfect racks for home or small cellar, or closet. they looks good, are very light when empty and stable. i have 2 fully loaded and they are nice addition for my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr S

customer_reviews.title: Good value wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This 23 bottle wine rack has found a place in my cellar (basement) so much so that I purchased four. It is a simple but efficient way to store your wine when you do not have a great deal of space for larger, more elaborate rack systems. While it is fairly lightweight, the addition of the bottles will keep the rack firmly in place and will not tip over. I highly recommend this rack for people who need a decent storage system without having to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Batmang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing it looks great and is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. This rack looks great and holds my collection I recently got while touring Sonoma wineries. It’s sturdy the wines won’t fall out and takes up minimal amounts of room in the corner. I love everything about this.
customer_reviews.author: nydunes

customer_reviews.title: Wobby but not even drunk yet
customer_reviews.text: Bit wobbly and somewhat terrified the dog is gonna knock it over unless it's balanced correctly but overall looks good and holds the bottle well. When you fill it up pay attention to how the weight is distributed, helps cut out that wobble that comes from I'm assuming a slightly worn foot or tweaked metal. Or maybe my tile is messed up, IDK.
customer_reviews.author: Jospeh T Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and no assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Took this wine rack straight out of the box and got to work stocking it up. I’m desperately low on wine at the moment, but even with just the bottom couple of rows filled this rack seems quite stable. It’s narrow enough to be the perfect size for an unused corner of our kitchen bar counter, and provides excellent storage capacity for its small footprint. Overall quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kelseybobelsey

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wine Rack!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would hold more than 20 bottles. The rack came and it works great. It is not very heavy, but a great value for the money. It fits all sizes of wine bottles (I have several different types and brands). I would definitely recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice metal standing wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Comes assembled. It's about 40' tall Had been looking for one more like 5' tall, to hold more bottles but gave up. This is sturdy Holds only the typical wine bottle, not larger bottles. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crotty

customer_reviews.title: Mine is very sturdy unlike some of the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Mine is very sturdy unlike some of the other reviews. Love that it is one piece so there’s no assembly. I just wish I could fit my champagne bottles in there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: My Cardiologist wants me to drink two four ounces glasses of red wine daily. I joined a wine club to save money and get wine from all over Europe, as well as wine from our country. It wasn't long before I had more wine than I had storage space. I purchased this wine rack, and I can say, with no reservations what-so-ever, I am very pleased with it. I like it so much that I plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good, but short..
customer_reviews.text: The wine stand looks cute. The pro is it hold a decent number of wine bottles, good enough for a couple to stock up a bunch of wines. However, it's surprisingly short, you have to bend to grab every bottle. I wouldn't recommend unless you are planning to elevate it with a table or something.
customer_reviews.author: P3Ac3

customer_reviews.title: Great and very compact!
customer_reviews.text: I must confess I transposed the numbers on this and thought I was getting a 32 bottle storage rack,not a 23. That was my fault. Having said that I am extremely pleased with this rack. All in one piece,no assembly! That's a big positive for me. It also is very compact and easily fit into a small space. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Louie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack comes fully assembled. It is made of strong steel and is sturdy, even with a full complement of 23 bottles. Downside is that it will only take 750 ml bottles. Wish they made one for 1.75 size. All in all, a nice product at a fair price. I would do business with seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack was exactly as advertised. It is quite sturdy, allows the wine to be stored at an angle which keeps the corks wet (one of the things I most wanted), and accommodates all our wine. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Delia G.

customer_reviews.title: like installing caps versus just the open round metal feet
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it. I wish they had done something with the feet, like installing caps versus just the open round metal feet. Looking for something to either insert or to cover the metal feet. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Kruszka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little wine rack!
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised by how easy it was to assemble and how sturdy it is. We are going to order a second one! Doesn’t take up much space, looks nice and holds quite a few bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie M

customer_reviews.title: Small footprint, light and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 of these wine racks now. They require very little floor space arranged in the dining room, and are efficient in their design and sturdy to hold the bottles. All have been of good quality and are uniform in color.
customer_reviews.author: BDL

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, modestly priced wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice and good looking little wine rack for a very modest price. Some racks are meant for simply storage and don’t look nice enough to have out, but this one is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice but defective
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the wine rack but when I put it on the floor, I noticed that it wasn't level. So I turned it upside down to look at the legs and two of them were bent. I paid $46.00 for it and was not happy that the legs were bent on it. It was a nice wine rack, I would like to order another one, but afraid that the next one might be the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Woody1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little wine rack!! Just the size I needed (been trying to find a small one), and it fits exactly where I needed it to. It's actually sturdier than I thought it might be, and came out of the box ready to use! I may just have to order another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value and really nice
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It’s awesome that it comes already assembled. We have a small apartment and it looks great in our living room. It’s compact, but still holds a lot of bottles. We are thinking about buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Astacio

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is small but mighty. It fits perfectly in my closet. No more stashing wine here and there. I’m not worried that it will fall over. Would definitely recommend this rack if you are short on space or want to display it on a countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Saw this wine rack and and it's perfect! Very lovely to look at as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought several bottles of wine for my son's wedding and had a lot left over. They were all over the floor so I needed something to store them in while taking up limited floor space. Saw this wine rack and and it's perfect! Very lovely to look at as well. I may order another!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: First one was fine. Comes assembled one foot was bent, but easily straightened. Bought another to put next to it. First was shiny black, second dull matte black. But next to each other, not too noticeable. Bought rubber pads to put on the bottom of the feet. Good value for price
customer_reviews.author: Elbereth56

customer_reviews.title: The wine rack looks good and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack looks good and is sturdy. Only thing keeping me from a 5-star rating is bottle size. Bordeaux type wine bottles fit without a problem, but those of a slightly larger circumference (over 11.25 inches) do not. I belong to a wine club that uses unique wine bottles, and they are too large. Also sparkling wine bottles are a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: John Hanck

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but fabulous wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with this wine rack. It arrived fully assembled very quickly, and fits perfectly in the space that I have next to my wine fridge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wine rack! It's study enough and looks more expensive than it is. My friends have all commented on how nice it is. I have this wine rack about 2/3 full and the bottles fit nicely and securely. It arrived on time and in good condition. I would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Turner

customer_reviews.title: sorbus wine rack
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it does not have doors which just get in the way. It is very compact and you can find a spot for it easily. Seems pretty sturdy but easy to move -- I like the handle at the top. Excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: s.a. haynes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed but needs leg caps
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Great price. The only issue was that the legs were a bit rusty poo it of the box and were straight metal - sitting on hardwoods or carpet that would not be good. Luckily I had some felt pads handy so I think it will be okay. Will check back to see if the product is leaving rust stains on the carpet. Manufacturer might want to consider plastic caps for the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Russell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a small space
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wine rack for our dining room. We recently bought a large dining room table with 6 chairs, and didn't have much room around the table. This wine rack fits perfectly into a corner of the room, holds many wine bottles, and looks very sleek in its design. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Good, well priced wine racks
customer_reviews.text: These are nice wine racks. There's nothing to assemble; just set them up and put in your wine bottles. They are also space-efficient and look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think the quality would be great for the price I paid. Turned out I was wrong. Might order another one. Looks great and is very sturdy. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Under 40$ and works
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, holds wine bottles at slight downward angle so corks stay soaked. No padding on feet of wine rack, sharp, pointy metal feet need to be immediately covered with a pad of some sort to avoid scratches. Painted metal is low quality. I ordered black, painted surfaces had portions that look like they are missing paint. Under 40$ and works.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Sansbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My rack came already assembled. It is well made and quite sturdy. Would like to see it come with rubber padding under the part that touches the floor. But no worries, that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Don Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: The wine rack arrived just as scheduled and is just what we needed! It looks beautiful and holds 23 bottles. Although quite sturdy, recommend loading from the bottom up so that it does not become top heavy, especially if standing the rack on a carpeted surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jean P.

customer_reviews.title: like this product and only gave 3 stars instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Came crooked, can probably knock the crooked foot off and resodder but was in such a rush to use it and we just keep the wine in there evenly so that we don't have to worry about the rush job on the feet the company did. Otherwise, like this product and only gave 3 stars instead of 4 bc I'll eventually have to fix this item.
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: Elegant simplicity at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. Elegant simplicity, holds just one bottle short of two cases in a nice small footprint. Color blends nicely with any decor. Nice sturdy design
customer_reviews.author: Lee T. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The feet on this rack are shaped like bottle caps with the sharp edge down
customer_reviews.text: Had to return mine. The feet on this rack are shaped like bottle caps with the sharp edge down. Not good for hardwood or even vinyl floors if loaded. Looked at big box store for cap but couldn't find one that fit. Upon closer inspection the welds on one of the feet was broken. This product needs a flat bottom foot that a felt pad will fit on to protect floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect standing wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, simple wine rack. I love that it came shipped assembled. All I had to do was pull it out of the box and place!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandriabeth

customer_reviews.title: BEST FIND EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rack ever! I use mine for my large soda bottles and they fit perfectly. I make my own kombucha and ginger drinks, so I have a lot of bottles. This keeps them off my cabinet and organized. I think this is one of my best finds ever!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Entringer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice wine rack . Thought it would be larger but I’m glad it isn’t. Holds 23 bottles and takes up very little space yet looks nice .
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for under a bar.
customer_reviews.text: Great rack for the money. Fits under the edge of our countertop bar perfectly to keep it out of the way and use space that wasn’t previously used.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little wine rack. It is sturdy, well made, small and unobtrusive . I am very impressed. Good value for the money. Nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia Pratt

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size (doesn't cost a fortune to fill it)
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size (doesn't cost a fortune to fill it), looks stylish and fits both the space and the décor of my open kitchen. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cordtz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small space
customer_reviews.text: Rack is sturdy and was perfect for my small space. I have several other racks to hold my 300+ bottles (I Know I drink too much) but this one is very useful in its own right.
customer_reviews.author: V. I. Holbein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. It stays full at all times and has never failed or tipped over. Great product! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have ordered for my wife's growing wine collection. Very sturdy and comes already put together. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: steven p tippett

customer_reviews.title: Gets 2 cases of wine off your floor!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive only because it is already assembled - just open the box and start loading it up. Neutral enough to put in a formal dining room but very functional. Sturdy - stores wine safely but compactly. Only downside is that compactness reduces visibility of individual wine labels, but that's an inevitable tradeoff to fit this many bottles in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wine rack is perfect! It not only looks great & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is perfect! It not only looks great & sturdy, but it came fully assemble! It is functional, as well as, compliments any decor.
customer_reviews.author: ann m

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what we wanted. Perfect size for where we wanted to place it, holds more than enough bottles of wine and we plan on filling (& refilling) it often. We find it to be very attractive and were happy that there was no assembly required. It is only sized for "regular" sized wine bottles, however, so if you want it for larger ones, it might not work for you but it was perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which I like. I got the gold and it's very subtle
customer_reviews.text: Was worried from reviews that some of my thicker wine bottles might not fit. They did. This product was exactly as appeared. It is simple and doesn't take up much room, which I like. I got the gold and it's very subtle. Reduced one star because it had metal feet and I had to put adhesive pads on the bottom so it didn't scratch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: sumanness

customer_reviews.title: Totally love, love love this rack
customer_reviews.text: Totally love, love love this rack! My husband and I were so impressed with the quality and price we ordered 2. Then when we showed it to 2 of ours friends, they ordered one for themselves. Order one and you will not be disappointed. Also comes quickly. At least with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking maid

customer_reviews.title: The holes are a bit smaller than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the rack, but I have some bottles that are a bit wider than the holes in the rack. I bought the rack for more storage, my previous rack holes where a bit bigger and could hold the larger bottles, but overall, I really like the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great wine rack, nicely constructed; would look good pretty much anywhere in your house. I put felt pads under the legs to avoid marking my hardwood floors when it's fully loaded, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Stonell

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wine rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wine rack. Holds 23 bottles but Doesn't take up a lot of space. I needed a wine rack I could put in my dining area to make it easy to grab a bottle of wine for dinner. This rack is perfect for my needs. Very sturdy. I highly recommend it. I'll use this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: When you need to keep wine on hand, this is a great way to store it.
customer_reviews.text: People in my family love wine, so I need to keep a few bottles on hand for various occasions. It's sturdy and holds the bottles in the proper orientation. A decent value.
customer_reviews.author: f2x

customer_reviews.title: This wine rack is very attractive and small enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: This wine rack is very attractive and small enough for use as a supplemental storage for extra wines that don't fit in the wine cooler. At least the corks won't dry out and the bottles are off the floor!
customer_reviews.author: sandra rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wine Rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is very attractive, comes in different colors and is well balanced. I bought the bronze and it fits perfectly in my diningroom. This is a good purchase and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: fabricaddict

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it doesn't need to be assembled. It looks great. It's sturdy. It doesn't take much space. A+
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

product_meta.title: Sorbus Wine Rack Bordeaux Chateau Style - Holds 23 Bottles - No Assembly Required (Black)
feature_bullets: Arched, free-standing wine rack stores up to 23 bottles of your favorite wine (Black)
Constructed of durable metal that holds each bottle horizontally to keep wine fresh longer until you’re ready to drink
Elegant design to accent any home, kitchen, dining room, or wine cellar
Great wine rack to store or start any wine collection – Also makes a great gift for any special occasion
No Assembly Required – Can be placed right on floor and has a handle for easy portability – Holds most standard wine bottles and measures approximately 7”x13”x34”

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,159 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
